studioLead.name: Al Iannucci
studioLead.title: Studio Manager / Digital Technician / Prop Builder
studioLead.bio: With over 12 years of experience in commercial photography production, I've had the privilege of working with some of the world's most recognized brands. My role spans digital technical direction, prop building, and overall studio management—ensuring every shoot runs seamlessly from concept to final delivery. I'd love to introduce you to my incredible team.

categories.title: Hair & Makeup
categories.description: Professional hair styling and makeup artistry

vendors.name: Noel McKinnon
vendors.bio: Noel McKinnon is the founder and award winning makeup/hair artist leading Makeup 2 die 4. Known as “the wedding whisperer” per her Best of Boston award. Noel is not just known for styling flawless brides but also has been acknowledged for her impeccable work for some of the most well recognizable people, publications and productions in the world. Alex Baldwin, Hilary Clinton, Tim Gun, People Magazine, ELLE, Modern Luxury Wedding, HBO, Showtime, and Walburger’s to name a few. She was also nominated top five finalist twice in the North American Hairstyling Awards for makeup.
